content.body:
And I do think there's a world where `enum` could be extended to support ADTs, e.g.:
```ts
enum Message {
  Quit,
  Write(text),
  Move({x, y}),
}
```
content.formatted_body:

  Quit,
  Write(text),
  Move({x, y}),
